{{Infobox Key Item |name = Pokéball Bag |image = [[File:PokeballBag_HighRes.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Pokéball Bag''. |use = A small bag that can hold many different types of [[Pokéballs]] |obtain = After first Pokémon caught }} ===Description=== A small bag that can hold many different types of Pokéballs ===Acquisition=== Choose your starter Pokémon and defeat it. Professor Oak will add it to your [[Key Items]] list ===Effects=== Used to hold different type of Pokéballs
